column3: The caster of this spell will emit a burning glow of pure fire energy. The holy light will imbue each of the caster's allies with the Blessing of the Warrior.
This spell generates a powerful gravity around the caster. The target's Allie's will all be forced into a new position.
This spell causes a cataclysm of pure storm energy. Falling stars will hex each of the target's allies.
The caster of this spell will command Sphera's plates to shift and slide. The quaking earth will cause each of the target's allies to become bound.
The caster of this spell will hurl a flaming orb toward the target.
This spell does a small amount of damage to its target, but its primary purpose is to heal the caster's team.
The caster of this sprite will produce a burst of storm energy. The blast causes its target to become bound.
This spell uses the corrosive properties of earth energy to eat away at the target apparition. A fraction of the depleted energy will be used to restore the caster's team.
The caster of this spell will use some magic energy to produce a destructive burst using it's physical body.
This spell summons a pool of ancient healing energy. The caster's team will be healed and each ally will be granted the Blessing of the Tree.
The caster of this spell will generate a small tornado and send it toward the target. The target will be imbued with the Curse of the Warrior.
The caster of this spell will produce a warm glow that completely restores the health of their team.
This spell projects a destructive blast of water energy.
The caster of this spell will use their physical form to totally apprehend the target. The target will become bound.
This spell uses pure earth energy to generate abundant flora and cause it to grow rapidly. The arena will change to a forest.
This spell will cause the target to become weighed down by water energy. This will grant the target the Curse of the Tree and cannot be dodged.
This spell crushes the enemy with the intense weight of the sky. All nearby enemies will be granted the Curse of the Tree.
This spell will cause earth energy to sprout from all the negativity plaguing the arena. All curses and hindrances will be removed.
The caster of this spell will use magic energy to launch their apparition toward the target. This gives the caster a high chance of attacking first.
The caster of this spell foretells of a terrible fate. A powerful energy blast will befall the target's team after 3 turns.
The caster of this spell will project their apparition before the target, causing them to take any spells or attacks in their target's stead.
This spell releases a warm blanket of water energy that calms the caster's team. All allies' curses will turn into blessings.
The caster of this spell attacks the target from behind with a rush of water energy. This grants the target the Curse of the Imp.
This spell allows the caster to fully understand the target's perspective for a moment. The caster will adopt the target's mindset.
This spell releases a shadowy flame from beneath the target. All of the target's nearby allies will become hexed.
The caster of this spell will wait until the end of the turn to attack. Until then, any storm spells will be drawn to the caster and add to the power of the spell.
This spell causes the earth beneath the target to soften and begin to absorb their apparition. This causes the target to be bound.
The caster of this spell will embody pure evil and cover the target with a blanket of negativity. The target and all their nearby allies will become hexed and bound.
The caster of this spell will latch onto the target and begin to siphon their energy. Energy depleted by this spell will be used to restore the caster's team.
The caster of this spell will connect with the target telepathically and flood the channel with destructive energy. The caster will take a fraction of the damage.
This spell causes water energy to cascade down on the arena. This summons the effect of rust on the target's side of the field.
This spell sends a powerful burst of storm energy from the caster to the target. This grants the target the Curse of the Imp and it cannot be dodged.

This spell uses the forest's bounty to bolster their team's defenses. It fails unless the arena is forest. This resets the arena, fully restores the caster's MP and HP, and grants the Blessing of the Tree to all of the caster's allies.
The caster of this spell absorbs energy by siphoning the target's water essence. This will restore the caster's team's HP.
This spell causes the target to suddenly freeze over. This causes the target to become bound and cannot be dodged.
This spell causes the earth beneath the target to quake and split apart. This resets the arena and grants the Curse of the Warrior to the target and their nearby allies.
The caster of this spell generates an Energy Blast within the target's space. The power of the blast is relative to the caster's luck for the turn.
The caster of this spell searches the target's consciousness for any frays and uses that weak point to flip their mindset.
The caster of this spell searches the target for a weak point, then delivers an attack that exploits that weak point.
This spell causes the entire arena to quake until the ground beneath the target completely breaks open.
This spell allows the caster to become totally invulnerable. At the end of the turn, the caster then takes the chance to deliver a high speed attack to the target.
The caster of this spell delivers an attack to the target that is imbued with energy that is dedicated to shattering material structures. This attack is more effective against mechanical sprites.
The caster of this spell summons a flame designed to banish spirits. This is more effective against astral sprites.

The caster of this spell sings a magical song that stokes the spirits of their nearby allies. This restores some of their teams HP and grants the Blessing of the Warrior to the caster and all nearby allies.
This spell produces a powerful flame with a toxic smoke. This summons miasma on the target's side of the field.
This spell summons magical crystals from the beneath the target. This causes the target to become hexed.
The caster of this spell attacks the target's weak spot with a destructive blast. The caster takes half of the damage done to the target.
This spell creates a confusing energy about the enemy's side of the field. The opposing sprites have their positions randomly swapped.
The caster of this spell attempts to dodge any spells or attacks targeting them this turn. If they are successful in dodging, they deliver a powerful attack to their target at the end of the turn.
This spell generates a magical field around the caster which will deflect any spells back to their caster.
The caster of this spell waits to be targeted by an attack. Once they are attacked, the spell is cast. This ignores any damage done to the caster and halves the target's resistance when retaliating.
The caster of this spell generates an Energy Blast of random power against either the caster's team or the enemy team. The power of the blast is completely random.
The caster of this spell trades a quarter of their team's current HP for half of the enemy's current MP.
This spell produces a powerful blast of pure storm energy. The electromagnetic waves produced by the spell will summon hum on the target's side of the field.
The caster of this spell puts all of their fire energy into one powerful attack. This leaves the target imbued with the Curse of the Mother.
The caster of this spell emits an explosion of earth energy. This volatile mixture of natural essences will summon miasma on both sides of the field.
The caster of this spell hurls a razor-sharp blast of air toward the target. This causes the target to be imbued with the Curse of the Imp.
This spell spreads the pure essence of the caster around the field. This causes the arena to reflect the caster's elemental bias.
This spell summons an ancient hatred buried within the planet. This causes the arena to exploit the target's elemental bias.
The caster of this spell creates a mist of small magical crystals and hurls it at the target. This hexes the target and their nearby allies.
This spell unleashes a tower of magma from beneath the target. This causes the arena to change to a volcano.
This spell unleashes a rush of water from beneath the target. This causes the arena to become an ocean.
This spell creates a burst of wind so powerful that it causes the sky above the target to break open. This changes the arena to the stratosphere.
The caster of this spell unleashes a powerful mental attack on the target. This causes the target to become hexed.
The caster of this spell shatters the constitution of the target. This causes the target to become imbued with the Curse of the Imp.
The caster of this spell uses all of their power to attack the target, throwing the caster completely off balance. This causes the caster to become bound.

This spell uses the destructive volcano to attack the enemy team and shatter their defenses. It fails unless the arena is volcano. This resets the arena, summons miasma on the target's side of the field, and grants all enemy sprites the Curse of the Mother.
The caster of this spell uses magical channels to distribute information to their allies to help create an advantage. This causes all allies to have perfect luck for the rest of the turn.
This spell creates a crushing weight as it folds space itself. This resets the arena and causes all enemy sprites to become bound.
The caster of this spell compresses the temporal dimension in an attempt to give their team an advantage. This causes all enemy sprites to have the worst possible luck until the end of the turn.
This spell fills the field with the stench of death as it eradicates the essence of nature. This resets the arena and causes all enemy sprites to become hexed.
